Class w3c.amaya.amayaInit 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----w3c.amaya.amayaInit
public class amayaInit
extends Object
This is the Amaya-Java main class. It allow to start and stop the Java side of the application.

amayaInit()

main(String)
initialize the java side of Amaya-Java app.
Stop()
stop the java side of Amaya-Java app.

initialize the java side of Amaya-Java app.

stop the java side of Amaya-Java app.
